original_title: Sendai Girls Joshi Puroresu Big Show In Osaka
overview: Satomura scored a direct win over the Sendai Girls World Champion, and tried to issue a challenge to the champion before Hamada stopped her. Hamada suggested a match between herself and Satomura to determine the next challenger. Aja Kong said she wanted to challenge whoever comes out on top in the next World Championship match.
title: Sendai Girls Joshi Puroresu Big Show In Osaka
